response.overview: Former FBI Agent Will Graham, who was once almost killed by the savage Hannibal 'The Cannibal' Lecter, now has no choice but to face him again, as it seems Lecter is the only one who can help Graham track down a new serial killer.
response.tagline: To understand the origin of evil, you must go back to the beginning.
response.title: Red Dragon

titles.title: El silencio de los corderos El Dragon Rojo

results.name: The FBI Find the Tooth Fairy's Note in Hannibal's Cell
